Truck.description: This is your truck. It looks ready to hit the road, are you?

Warehouse.description: It is late in the year so the shelves are mostly empty

Front Office.description: This is the front office of your office where everyone checks in when they come in

Gas Station.description: This is gas station where trucks fill up for gas and people get their snacks

Boss' Office.description: This is boss' office where you get your next trip information

Break Room.description: This is a break room where people come to relax or eat on their breaks

Tech Room.description: This is tech room, place for all the IT nerds to hangout

HR Office.description: This is human resource room, place where pay check is made
